name: Factory Escape (Demo)
description:
Escape the factory and discover the secrets hidden within in this challenging 2D action platformer.

  • Fight your way out of the factory with fast-paced combat
  • Find new abilities to even the odds and reach new areas
  • Uncover the inner workings of this world and your role in it

Factory Escape currently has a demo build available for the purpose of soliciting feedback from players in preparation for the eventual final release. Please note that the demo represents an in-progress version of the game and everything is potentially subject to change in the final version.

Many thanks to 0x72 for creating the wonderful Industrial and Robot tilesets, without which this project would not have been possible.

Be sure to check the download page for platform-specific installation instructions.
